headline: IBM makes $11 billion move nobody saw coming
summary: IBMshares rose 0.5% on Dec. 8, adding to its 41% year-to-date stock gain, after the consulting provider announced its plans to acquire the real-time data streaming platform Confluent. More importantly, though, Confluent’s stock price soared 29% following the news, not its highest price at ...

headline: RBC sees software M&A heating up. Who’s next in line?
summary: Investing.com -- Dealmaking in the software sector is accelerating into year-end, with RBC Capital Markets pointing to a sharp pickup in activity and a growing list of potential targets as strategic buyers and private equity firms scour the market.

headline: VQ Capital Launches an AI-Driven Platform Engineered for the Next Generation of Investments
summary: VQ Capital launched today as a thesis-driven, AI-native investment platform designed to scale companies into category leaders. The firm focuses on two foundational theses: the AI Transformation of Consumer Companies and the "Golden Dome" for Cyber Intelligence.

headline: Cloud AI Update - Nova Era Labs Transforms AI Education with Virtual Lab Platform
summary: Nova Era Labs has emerged as a pivotal player in cloud AI education by introducing the United States' first comprehensive cloud-based virtual lab platform designed for AI engineering. This platform provides extensive hands-on experience with 450 labs, unlimited CPU resources, and GPU access, addressing the critical AI skills gap by enabling students to work with real-world computational tools. By emphasizing practical application alongside a strong mathematical foundation, Nova Era Labs aims...

headline: IBM Stock: What's Next For Tech Giant After Biggest Acquisition In Six Years
summary: IBM stock traded sideways the day after announcing its largest acquisition since 2019.  Chief Executive and Chairman Arvind Krishna said in a news release that IBM and Confluent will together "enable enterprises to deploy generative and agentic AI better and faster."  Confluent offers cloud-based data streaming software, described as a central nervous system for enterprises instantly sort data.

content.title: IBM Stock: What's Next For Tech Giant After Biggest Acquisition In Six Years
content.summary: IBM stock traded sideways the day after announcing its largest acquisition since 2019.  Chief Executive and Chairman Arvind Krishna said in a news release that IBM and Confluent will together "enable enterprises to deploy generative and agentic AI better and faster."  Confluent offers cloud-based data streaming software, described as a central nervous system for enterprises instantly sort data.

headline: Bodine & Co. Accelerates Partner Revenue with New PX Practice
summary: Bodine & Co., the experience strategy consultancy founded by customer experience pioneer and Outside In co-author Kerry Bodine, today announced the launch of its Partner Experience (PX) Practice, created through a strategic integration with Xcelerator Network, the partner go-to-market strategy firm led by ecosystem expert Jeff Ballard, formerly of IBM. Jeff Ballard will assume the role of Head of Partner Experience at Bodine & Co.

content.title: Bodine & Co. Accelerates Partner Revenue with New PX Practice
content.summary: Bodine & Co., the experience strategy consultancy founded by customer experience pioneer and Outside In co-author Kerry Bodine, today announced the launch of its Partner Experience (PX) Practice, created through a strategic integration with Xcelerator Network, the partner go-to-market strategy firm led by ecosystem expert Jeff Ballard, formerly of IBM. Jeff Ballard will assume the role of Head of Partner Experience at Bodine & Co.

thumbnail.caption: Kerry Bodine, co-author of 'Outside In: The Power of Putting Customers at the Center of Your Business,' and CEO of Bodine & Co., an experience-led growth firm helping organizations navigate the complexities of the Age of AI.

headline: 3 Monthly-Paying Dividend ETFs Perfect for Retirement Income
summary: After over a decade of ultra-low yields, retirees are finding themselves much more comfortable due to Treasuries yielding sub-5% interest rates. Many investors are locking in that rate. It may be a good idea if you are someone who is very elderly, but stocks have a history of outperforming Treasuries long-term. headline: DATCos- Why You Should Stay Away from These Stocks
summary: There are plenty of stocks still worth buying and holding out there…the same types of conservative, dividend-paying companies I’ve specialized in for more than 25 years. But there are far more groups to hate right now – one of which is the so-called digital asset treasury companies (DATCos), notes Nilus Mattive, editor of Safe Money Report.
